DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety/tolerability pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics CKD-519 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Between 19 age 55 age healthy adult 2 . Body weight 55kg male , 50kg female 3 . Body Mass Index 18.5 25 ( body mass index=kg/m2 ) 4 . If female , must include one among item The menopause ( natural menses least 2 year ) Surgical Infertility ( hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy , tubal ligation method infertility condition 5 . If men sexual life woman childbearing age , Necessarily agree use condom sperm donation two month clinical trial final dosage investigational product 6 . Those fully understand clinical trial enough hearing , decide join clinical trial comply precaution write consent 1 . Have clinically significant disease hepatobiliary system ( severe hepatic impairment , etc ) , kidney ( severe renal impairment , etc ) , nervous system , immune system , respiratory system , endocrine system , hematooncology disease , cardiovascular system ( heart failure , etc ) mental illness , history mental disease . 2 . Have gastrointestinal disease history effect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , etc . ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) 3 . Hypersensitivity reaction clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction history drug additives . 4 . An impossible one participate clinical trial include screen test ( medical history taking , BP , 12lead ECG , physical examination , blood & urine laboratory test result ) 28 day take investigational Products . 5 . Defined follow laboratory parameter AST , ALT > 1.25* upper limit normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5* upper limit normal range CPK > 1.5* upper limit normal range eGFR ( use MDRD method ) < 60mL/min/1.73m2 6 . Sitting SBP > 150mmHg < 90mmHg , sit DBP > 100mmHg < 50mmHg , 5 minute break . 7 . Drug abuse history drug abuse showes positive urine drug test . 8 . Pregnant lactating woman . 9 . A heavy caffeine consumer ( caffeine > 5 cups/day ) , alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 210g/week ) , smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day ) 10 . Subject take ethical drug herbal medicine within 14 day , OTC within 7 day begin study treatment investigator determine take drug affect study could affect safety subject . 11 . Subject take inhibitor inducer drug metabolize enzyme ( Barbiturates etc . ) within 30 day . 12 . Taking food contain grapefruit within 7 day begin study treatment ( ex . Drinking contain grapefruit 1L per day within 7 day begin study treatment ) 13 . Subject treat investigational drug within 60 day begin study treatment ( However , biologicals applies 90 day , base extended period time consider halflife ) 14 . Previously donate whole blood within 60 day component blood within 30 day . 15 . An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason . 16 . Positive Serology test ( Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV )
